data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the country of Marshall Islands, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Marshall Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: the country of Marshall Islands has (about) 31,217 people who know Jesus, 24,988 people who know about him culturally, and 2,795 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Marshall Islands will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, please help the 31,217 believers in the country of Marshall Islands to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Japanese people.
Father, please raise up prophets in Marshall Islands who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 31,217 believers living in Marshall Islands.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the country of Marshall Islands has a population of 59,000.

We estimate Marshall Islands has 31,217 people who might know Jesus, 24,988 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,795 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the country of Marshall Islands.
